project_descr: Phase-out Management Plan for CFCs in the Refrigeration (Servicing) Sector in Indonesia

outputs.output_descr: Number of metric tonnes Ozone Depleting Substances (ODS) phase-out from servicing activities, Number of trainings for technicians to promote the importance of Ozone Layer Protection and ODS phase-out, Number of commissioning/ trainings to capacitate technicians in using refrigerant recycling and recharging, Number of workshops on the implementation of ministerial decrees on the banning of ODS production, the imports of goods containing ODS, and the registration of servicing technicians, Number of retrofitting for selected companies, Number of guidelines for technicians.
